ygData.msgSnippet: It s the same thing as the invisibility spell, isn t it?  Or rather invisibility + invisibility to undead?  Granted rogues are the only ones who can do it
ygData.messageBody:
It's the same thing as the invisibility spell, isn't it? Or rather
invisibility + invisibility to undead? Granted rogues are the only ones
who can do it without using mana, but then casting classes don't have to
move as slowly when their invisible as rogues do when hiding & sneaking.

Peace
Evulia the bard and Mead the rogue, Tunare
